question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. cargo trailer
B. white truck
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The cargo trailer is positioned behind the white truck in the image, and both are further back than the foreground bench, making the trailer appear further away from the camera.
